mapper.select: /* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.account_cnt*/ SELECT 100 as total_cnt, 50 as qntfact_cnt, 50 as qltfact_cnt FROM DUAL
/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.remark_cnt*/ select 10 as remark_y_cnt, 10 as remark_n_cnt FROM DUAL
/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.mrc_ipe_cnt*/ select 250 as plc_cnt, 0 as mrc_cnt, 30 ipe_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_account_cnt*/ SELECT '현재' as term_code, 100 AS total_cnt, 50 AS qntfact_cnt, 50 AS qltfact_cnt FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '전기간' as term_code, 90 AS total_cnt, 40 AS qntfact_cnt, 50 AS qltfact_cnt FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '전 전기간' as term_code, 80 AS total_cnt, 30 AS qntfact_cnt, 50 AS qltfact_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_process_cnt*/ select '현재' as term_code, 150 as process_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전기간' as term_code, 140 as process_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전 전기간' as term_code, 130 as process_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_elc_cnt*/ select '현재' as term_code, 80 as elc_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전기간' as term_code, 70 as elc_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전 전기간' as term_code, 60 as elc_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_plc_cnt*/ select '현재' as term_code, 150 as plc_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전기간' as term_code, 140 as plc_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전 전기간' as term_code, 130 as plc_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_remark_cnt*/ select '현재' as term_code, 10 as remark_y_cnt, 10 as remark_n_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전기간' as term_code, 9 as remark_y_cnt, 10 as remark_n_cnt FROM DUAL union all select '전 전기간' as term_code, 8 as remark_y_cnt, 10 as remark_n_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.modal_mrc_ipe_cnt*/ SELECT '현재' AS term_code, 0 as mrc_cnt, 30 as ipe_cnt FROM DUAL union all SELECT '전기간' AS term_code, 0 as mrc_cnt, 20 as ipe_cnt FROM DUAL union all SELECT '전 전기간' AS term_code, 0 as mrc_cnt, 10 as ipe_cnt FROM DUAL
/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.perform_percent*/ select 100 as end_cnt, 0 as nend_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.total_test_progress*/ SELECT '율(%)' AS gubun, 100 AS test_target, 10 AS test_notwrite, 15 AS test_notsubmit, 35 AS test_approving, 0 AS test_reject, 40 AS test_approved FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.test_progress*/ SELECT 'gubun1' as gubun, 10 as test_target, 10 as test_notwrite, 10 as test_notsubmit, 10 as test_approving, 10 as test_reject, 10 as test_approved FROM DUAL union all SELECT 'gubun2' as gubun, 15 as test_target, 15 as test_notwrite, 15 as test_notsubmit, 15 as test_approving, 15 as test_reject, 15 as test_approved FROM DUAL union all SELECT 'gubun3' as gubun, 20 as test_target, 20 as test_notwrite, 20 as test_notsubmit, 20 as test_approving, 20 as test_reject, 20 as test_approved FROM DUAL union all SELECT 'gubun4' as gubun, 25 as test_target, 25 as test_notwrite, 25 as test_notsubmit, 25 as test_approving, 25 as test_reject, 25 as test_approved FROM DUAL
/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.gap_progress*/ SELECT 5 AS ing_gap_cnt, 3 AS end_gap_cnt FROM DUAL

/* oracle.icm_dashBoardChart.dept_progress*/ SELECT '부서1' dept_name, 10 as test_target, 10 as test_notwrite, 10 as test_notsubmit, 10 as test_approving, 10 as test_reject, 10 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서2' dept_name, 5 as test_target, 5 as test_notwrite, 5 as test_notsubmit, 5 as test_approving, 5 as test_reject, 5 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서3' dept_name, 15 as test_target, 15 as test_notwrite, 15 as test_notsubmit, 15 as test_approving, 15 as test_reject, 15 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서4' dept_name, 20 as test_target, 20 as test_notwrite, 20 as test_notsubmit, 20 as test_approving, 20 as test_reject, 20 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서5' dept_name, 10 as test_target, 10 as test_notwrite, 10 as test_notsubmit, 10 as test_approving, 10 as test_reject, 10 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서6' dept_name, 30 as test_target, 30 as test_notwrite, 30 as test_notsubmit, 30 as test_approving, 30 as test_reject, 30 as test_approved FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT '부서7' dept_name, 5 as test_target, 5 as test_notwrite, 5 as test_notsubmit, 5 as test_approving, 5 as test_reject, 5 as test_approved FROM DUAL
